verses.verse: David<WH1732> spoke<WH1696> to Yahweh<WH3068> the words<WH1697> of this song<WH7892> in the day<WH3117> that Yahweh<WH3068> delivered<WH5337> him out of the hand<WH3709> of all his enemies,<WH341> and out of the hand<WH3709> of Saul:<WH7586>
and he said,<WH559> "Yahweh<WH3068> is my rock,<WH5553> my fortress,<WH4686> and my deliverer,<WH6403> even mine;

God,<WH430> my rock,<WH6697> in him I will take refuge;<WH2620> my shield,<WH4043> and the horn<WH7161> of my salvation,<WH3468> my high tower,<WH4869> and my refuge.<WH4498> My savior,<WH3467> you save<WH3467> me from violence.<WH2555>
I will call<WH7121> on Yahweh,<WH3068> who is worthy to be praised:<WH1984> So shall I be saved<WH3467> from my enemies.<WH341>
For the waves<WH4867> of death<WH4194> surrounded<WH661> me.<WH5158> The floods of ungodliness<WH1100> made me afraid.<WH1204>
The cords<WH2256> of Sheol<WH7585> were around<WH5437> me.<WH4170> The snares of death<WH4194> caught me.<WH6923>

In my distress<WH6862> I called<WH7121> on Yahweh.<WH3068> Yes,<WH7121> I called to my God.<WH430> He heard<WH8085> my voice<WH6963> out of his temple.<WH1964> My cry<WH7775> came into his ears.<WH241>
Then the earth<WH776> shook<WH1607> and trembled.<WH7493> The foundations<WH4146> of heaven<WH8064> quaked<WH7264> and were shaken,<WH1607> because he was angry.<WH2734>
Smoke<WH6227> went up<WH5927> out of his nostrils.<WH639> Fire<WH784> out of his mouth<WH6310> devoured.<WH398> Coals<WH1513> were kindled by it.<WH1197>
He bowed<WH5186> the heavens<WH8064> also,<WH3381> and came down. Thick darkness<WH6205> was under his feet.<WH7272>
He rode<WH7392> on a cherub,<WH3742> and flew.<WH5774> Yes,<WH7200> he was seen on the wings<WH3671> of the wind.<WH7307>
He made<WH7896> darkness<WH2822> pavilions<WH5521> around<WH5439> himself:<WH2841> gathering of waters,<WH4325> and thick clouds<WH5645> of the skies.<WH7834>
At the brightness<WH5051> before him,<WH1513> coals of fire<WH784> were kindled.<WH1197>
Yahweh<WH3068> thundered<WH7481> from heaven.<WH8064> The Most High<WH5945> uttered<WH5414> his voice.<WH6963>
He sent out<WH7971> arrows,<WH2671> and scattered<WH6327> them;<WH1300> lightning, and confused them.<WH2000>

Then the channels<WH650> of the sea<WH3220> appeared.<WH7200> The foundations<WH4146> of the world<WH8398> were laid bare<WH1540> by the rebuke<WH1606> of Yahweh,<WH3068> At the blast<WH5397> of the breath<WH7307> of his nostrils.<WH639>
He sent<WH7971> from on high<WH4791> and he took<WH3947> me.<WH4871> He drew me out of many<WH7227> waters.<WH4325>
He delivered<WH5337> me from my strong<WH5794> enemy,<WH341> from those who hated<WH8130> me,<WH553> for they were too mighty for me.
They came on<WH6923> me in the day<WH3117> of my calamity,<WH343> but Yahweh<WH3068> was my support.<WH4937>
He also brought me out<WH3318> into a large place.<WH4800> He delivered<WH2502> me,<WH2654> because he delighted in me.
Yahweh<WH3068> rewarded<WH1580> me according to my righteousness.<WH6666> He rewarded<WH7725> me according to the cleanness<WH1252> of my hands.<WH3027>
For I have kept<WH8104> the ways<WH1870> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and have not wickedly departed<WH7561> from my God.<WH430>
For all his ordinances<WH4941> were before me.<WH2708> As for his statutes, I did not depart from them.<WH5493>
I was also perfect<WH8549> toward him.<WH8104> I kept myself from my iniquity.<WH5771>
Therefore Yahweh<WH3068> has rewarded<WH7725> me according to my righteousness,<WH6666> According to my cleanness<WH1252> in his eyesight.<WH5048>
With the merciful<WH2623> you will show yourself merciful.<WH2616> With the perfect<WH8549> man<WH1368> you will show yourself perfect.<WH8549>
With the pure<WH1305> you will show yourself pure.<WH1305> With the crooked<WH6141> you will show yourself shrewd.<WH6617>
You will save<WH3467> the afflicted<WH6041> people,<WH5971> But your eyes<WH5869> are on the haughty,<WH7311> that you may bring them down.<WH8213>
For you are my lamp,<WH5216> Yahweh.<WH3068> Yahweh<WH3068> will light<WH5050> up my darkness.<WH2822>
For by you,<WH7323> I run against a troop.<WH1416> By my God,<WH430> I leap over<WH1801> a wall.<WH7791>
As for God,<WH410> his way<WH1870> is perfect.<WH8549> The word<WH565> of Yahweh<WH3068> is tested.<WH6884> He is a shield<WH4043> to all those who take refuge in him.<WH2620>
For who is God,<WH410> besides<WH1107> Yahweh?<WH3068> Who is a rock,<WH6697> besides<WH1107> our God?<WH430>
God<WH410> is my strong<WH4581> fortress.<WH2428> He makes<WH5425> my way<WH1870> perfect.<WH8549>
He makes<WH7737> his feet<WH7272> like<WH7737> hinds<WH355>' feet,<WH5975> and sets me on my high places.<WH1116>
He teaches<WH3925> my hands<WH3027> to war,<WH4421> so that my arms<WH2220> bend<WH5181> a bow<WH7198> of brass.<WH5154>
You have also given<WH5414> me the shield<WH4043> of your salvation.<WH3468> Your gentleness<WH6031> has made me great.<WH7235>
You have enlarged<WH7337> my steps<WH6806> under me.<WH7166> My feet have not slipped.<WH4571>
I have pursued<WH7291> my enemies<WH341> and destroyed<WH8045> them.<WH7725> I didn't turn again until they were consumed.<WH3615>
I have consumed<WH3615> them,<WH4272> and struck them through,<WH6965> so that they can't arise. Yes,<WH5307> they have fallen under my feet.<WH7272>
For you have armed<WH247> me with strength<WH2428> for the battle.<WH4421> You have subdued<WH3766> under me those who rose up against me.<WH6965>
You have also made<WH5414> my enemies<WH341> turn their backs<WH6203> to me,<WH6789> that I might cut off those who hate me.<WH8130>
They looked,<WH8159> but there was none to save;<WH3467> even to Yahweh,<WH3068> but he didn't<WH6030> answer them.
Then I beat<WH7833> them as small as the dust<WH6083> of the earth.<WH776> I crushed<WH1854> them as the mire<WH2916> of the streets,<WH2351> and spread them abroad.<WH7554>

You also have delivered<WH6403> me from the strivings<WH7379> of my people.<WH5971> You have kept<WH8104> me to be the head<WH7218> of the nations.<WH1471> A people<WH5971> whom I have not known<WH3045> will serve me.<WH5647>
The foreigners<WH1121> will submit<WH3584> themselves to me.<WH8085> As soon as they hear of me,<WH8085> they will obey me.
The foreigners<WH1121> will fade away,<WH5034> and will come trembling<WH2296> out of their close places.<WH4526>
Yahweh<WH3068> lives!<WH2416> Blessed<WH1288> be my rock!<WH6697> Exalted<WH7311> be God,<WH430> the rock<WH6697> of my salvation,<WH3468>
even the God<WH410> who executes vengeance<WH5414> for me,<WH3381> who brings down peoples under me,<WH5971>
who brings me away<WH3318> from my enemies.<WH341> Yes,<WH7311> you lift me up above those who rise up<WH6965> against me.<WH5337> You deliver me from the violent<WH2555> man.<WH376>
Therefore I will give thanks<WH3034> to you,<WH3068> Yahweh, among the nations.<WH1471> Will sing praises<WH2167> to your name.<WH8034>

He<WH4024> gives great deliverance<WH3444> to his king,<WH4428> and shows<WH6213> loving kindness<WH2617> to his anointed,<WH4899> to David<WH1732> and to his seed,<WH2233> <WH5704> forevermore.<WH5769>"
